article_title: Disney+ to stream 'Frozen 2' just in time for your quarantine
article_description: With all the news of movie release delays amid the coronavirus pandemic  Disney just became the first company to offer the opposite  Disney  will make Frozen 2 available this weekend  three months earlier than planned  due to  these challenging times  accord
